event.title: Galia Mancheva speaks about Public Money? Public Code! at TuxCon in Plovdiv, Bulgaria

body.p: The FSFE Project Manager, Galia Mancheva will introduce the Public Money? Public Code! campaign in front of the local tech community in Plovdiv, Bulgaria on June 8th. TuxCon is an annual event about free and open source software and hardware. The entrance is free for all visitors.
